org.gridgain.grid.cache.GridCacheTx

Packages that use GridCacheTx
org.gridgain.grid.cache  Start Here  Contains main In-Memory Data Grid APIs.

org.gridgain.grid.cache.store.hibernate Contains reference Hibernate-based cache store implementation.

          Gets transaction started by this thread or null if this thread does not have a transaction.

          Starts new transaction with the specified concurrency and isolation.

          Starts transaction with specified isolation, concurrency, timeout, and invalidation flag.
 GridCacheTx GridCacheProjection.txStart(long timeout)
          Starts new transaction with the specified timeout and default concurrency, isolation, and invalidation policy.
